page.title: 18SUTTON BONINGTON GAMES
page.content: {BRITISH BULLDOG:}Any number of people stand in a row facing who is "on". The "on" person shouts the name of the person who is to cross. The named person has to get to the other side. If he does, the whole team joins him.If he gets tackled and is held down the opponent says{British Bulldog 1,2,3. Then he is "on" with the first person. {HOT RICE:}Everybody stands in a circle with their legs apart, someone drops the ball and if it rolls through your legs you are "on". The person who is "on" can run with the ball until he hits someone and then that person is "on" too. He can now pass the ball to his helper and the game carries on until everyone is hit except one person who is the winner. A person can defend himself by hitting the ball away with a flat hand.
